name: MinerXP
description: Pick up your pickaxe!!!Make your inference, use the best strategy and highest speed, DIG THEM ALL!!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 或更高 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2+ GHz Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50) Storage: 1000 MB available space
